original_text: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees: therefore every tree which bringeth not forth good fruit is hewn down, and cast into the fire.
korean_text: 이미 도끼가 나무 뿌리에 놓였으니 좋은 열매를 맺지 아니하는 나무마다 찍혀 불에 던져지리라

sentences.original_text: And now also the axe is laid unto the root of the trees:
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이제 또한 도끼가 나무들의 뿌리에 놓였으니

sentences.original_text: therefore every tree which bringeth not forth good fruit
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 좋은 열매를 맺지 않는 모든 나무는

sentences.original_text: is hewn down, and cast into the fire.
